ygData.subject: Re: Out for the fun of it.
ygData.msgSnippet: Wolfblade:: She transformed into bot mode while in his arms and smiled at him. Well, that s part of it. But also I wanted to spend domw time with you, alone

Wolfblade::

She transformed into bot mode while in his arms and smiled at him.
"Well, that's part of it. But also I wanted to spend domw time with
you, alone and without hesitation. I just wanted some fun times." she
said with an almost sappy look on her face.  She realized she was
letting her emotional programming the better of her judgement and
tried to save herself....too late. She leaned in and kissed his cheek.  
She felt her face plates flush and pushed herself free. "Uh, sorry, I,
ah, erhm, sort of, just, you know, got caught up."  She felt rather
stupid for a second and stood there wondering if now would be a good
time to just run for it.  She wanted him more than any bot should want
another. But she had a contender. Another bot was there to fight for
his affections. THough she tried to reconsile in herself that she must
just trust to duty and not let things get in her way, she still wanted
him.  She stood there letting her spark pound in her chest compartment. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> He tried to keep up with her movements, but in beast mode, it was
not too easy.  After a bit, he started to stumble, but recovered and
transformed into robot mode to keep from falling.  Once in robot mode,
he watched her better, and after he timed her movements right, he
reached out and caught her beast form, wearing a very pleased smirk.
>  
> "Heh heh, 'caught' ya!  Goodness, is all this hyperness because
you've been inside all day?  Goodness, we need to get out more."
> 
> Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She slowed down to a trot and smiled up at him. "Well, I could do
> something else.....should I? Oh yes, let's have some fun."  
> She started running circles around him and nipping, lovingly, at his
> heels. 
> 
> She wanted him. However, he seemed somehow, well, rather reserved
> about himself in someways. She kept her doubts to herself and kept
> just having fun with him. She did a few back flips and kept running
> circles around him. 
> 
> 
> "HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill! 
Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 
> 
>
